original: Åkerman, Johan Gustaf, professor, Göteborg, f. 4/3/88 i Wien av envoyén Henrik A. o. frih :an Louise Liljencrantz. G. 24 m. Anna-Lisa Ekelund. Barn: Sven Johan f. 25, DHS, Sthlm, Kristina 28, iStud., Sthlm. — Mog:ex. 06, jur. kand. i Upps. 13, jur. lic. i Lund 23, jur. dr s: å. Attaché resp. tf. andre sekr. i UD 15-18, doc. i nat:-ekon. v. Lunds univ. 23, prof. i nat:-ekon. o. sociologi v. Gbgs högsk. sed. 311. Skr.: Realkapital und Kapitalzins I-H (23-24), Den industr. rationaliseringen (Stat. ofif. utredn. 31), Mjölk- regleringen (37), Engeilsik arbetslöshet o. arbetslöshet (47) m. ;fL, art. i bl. a. Ekon. tidsikr. LVVS. Hobby: trädgårdsskötsel.
translated: Åkerman, Johan Gustaf, professor, Gothenburg, b. 4/3/88 in Vienna, son of the diplomat Henrik A. and the noblewoman Louise Liljencrantz. Married on the 24th with Anna-Lisa Ekelund. Children: Sven Johan, b. 25, Diplomate of the Royal Swedish Academy of Sciences, Stockholm, Kristina, b. 28, studying in Stockholm. Completed his master's degree in law in 1906, obtained a law degree from Uppsala University in 1913, a licentiate degree in law from Lund University in 1923, and a doctoral degree in law later on. Served as attaché and acting second secretary in the Ministry for Foreign Affairs from 1915-1918, became a lecturer in economics at Lund University in 1923, and has been a professor of economics and sociology at Gothenburg University since 1931. Publications include: Real Capital and Interest Rate I-H (1923-1924), Industrial Rationalization (1931, Governmental Official Investigation), Dairy Regulation (1937), Unemployment and Joblessness (1947) and several articles in Economic Times and other journals. Hobbies: gardening.

publication.name: Real Capital and Interest Rate I-H
